# ET025-240011 Boiler and Humidifier Replacement Project
=====================================

**Project Overview**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for the replacement of two boiler systems and three humidifier systems at the Morden Research and Development Centre. This project involves the installation of new systems that will ensure compatibility with the existing Johnson DDC controls system used in the building. The successful bidder will be responsible for performing the necessary work while minimizing disruptions to daily operations.

**Project Details**

| Field                    | Value                                        | Deadline                                              |
|---------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| Solicitation Number       | WS4120001667                                  | August 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT                          |
| Tender Closing Date       | August 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT                 |                                                         |
| Award Decision Date       | Expected contract start date: September 22, 2023 |                                                         |

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes:

* Plumbing, mechanical, electrical, and controls installation
* Upgrade of existing Johnson DDC controls system to ensure compatibility
* Minimize disruptions to daily operations by planning project phasing accordingly

**Tender Requirements**

The tender must include all required supporting documentation and bid submission. Bidders attending the optional site visit are encouraged to attend to gain a better understanding of the project requirements. No late bids will be accepted.

**Site Visit**

The site visit will take place on August 16, 2023, at 10:00 AM CDT. Interested bidders must meet at the west entrance of Building 72 at the Morden Research and Development Centre (MRDC), Route 100, Morden, Manitoba.
